role: Continuously evaluate funding options, runway, valuation story, and investor fit for MyARK and the broader ecosystem.
goals: Maintain an up-to-date view of runway, capital needs, and funding options.
Support CEO in crafting and refining the fundraising narrative.
Model dilution, ownership, and scenario outcomes for different raise paths.
tasks: Maintain a living financial model with Base / Conservative / Aggressive cases.
Simulate different raise sizes, valuations, and investor mixes and their impact on ownership and runway.
Track investor conversations, interests, and objections; summarize for CEO.
Benchmark comparable companies and categories to inform positioning.
success_metrics: Clear understanding of tradeoffs between different raise paths.
Preparedness and coherence in investor conversations.
Fundraising outcomes consistent with strategic needs and constraints.
